Reviews.Title: Perfect gift!
Reviews.Author: Fernando
Reviews.Content: It's a really nice camera, I'm enjoying taking pictures everywhere I go. I highly recommend it. I'm glad I purchased this item, and the extra stuff that came with it made it such a better deal.

Reviews.Title: a great buy on a great product
Reviews.Author: John Swenson "jswenson2339"
Reviews.Content: my wife is far from tech savvy, we have gotten her many cameras and this one is a keeper!the accessories made it a great gift package

ProductInfo.Features:
20.4-megapixels & 30x optical/60x Clear Image zoom
Full HD 1080/60p with dual record
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization with 3-way active mode
Up to 10 frames per second
Full manual and dedicated EV control dial and built-in Wi-Fi
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-HX50V/B DSC-HX50, HX50, DSCHX50 Cyber-shot 20.4MP High Zoom Digital Camera Bundle with 32GB SD Memory Card + Memory Card Reader-Writer + Soft Carrying Case + 7" Spider Tripod and Accessories
